name: Find all 3 hidden coins at Docks at night
Use Heal spot in Lava Room
Buy a stat increase from Hobbs
Kill a Gamulian/Little Bat with yellow magic/Fire Blob
Get game over (Die with 0 coins of life)
Kill a Saber Tiger with blue magic/Pollywog
Use Heal machine at Underground Ruins Atelier
Use Heal spot behind rolling boulder
Sell 3 Moon Stones at one time
Jump off the face at B&S area
Return to Town using 5 different frog plants
Speak to Rod at night time
